decision_conditions: The proposed roof light over the side dormer roof extension would exceed the height of the highest part of the existing roof, in conflict with Paragraph B.1 (b) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed rear extension and the side roof dormer extension would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) and B.2 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A and B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed side window would be non openable below 1.7m when measured from the floor level of the room, in conflict with Condition B.2 (c)(ii) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Demolition of existing rear conservatory, erection of single storey rear extension.  Erection of side dormer extension in existing loft.
